### Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

Add additional material if possible
* screenshots (necessary, if it is a UI bug)
* log files
* link to Kibana logs
* link to code snippets which cause the issue

### Reproducability
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

### Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
